content.text: The design shall take into account the relevant IEC standard for designing products  (IEC 62430:2019) and the use of material (IEC Guide 109) with regard to the environment.
La conception doit tenir compte de l'IEC applicable pour la conception de produits  (IEC 62430:2019) et l'utilisation de matériaux (IEC Guide 109) en ce qui concerne  l'environnement.

requirements.text: The design shall take into account the relevant IEC standard for designing products  (IEC 62430:2019) and the use of material (IEC Guide 109) with regard to the environment.
